# Linebreaker (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 1]], [[1st Level Magus Spells|Magus 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 59

You gain a +20 foot bonus to your base speed when charging and a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks made to [[Bull Rush|bull rush]] or [[Overrun|overrun]].

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
